mapper.select: SELECT A.* , ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(ROL_NM SEPARATOR ',') FROM ADM_ROLE AR INNER JOIN ROLES R ON AR.ROL_NO = R.ROL_NO WHERE AR.ADM_NO = A.ADM_NO ) AS ROLENAME FROM ADMIN A WHERE ID = #{id}
